author: Terriono

review: Great product. Remote is well designed & the voice command feature works extremely well. I would like to see the voice command bring up my "amazon cloud" music ( i.e.: Voice Command-"The Beatles" -  and have the remote pull up my Beatles albums- it does not).  However,  one can go to the music category- and find your uploaded music- by name). When I go to music, looking for my uploaded music- it takes a while (couple minutes or less) to find in the cloud ( albeit- I have a lot of music uploaded).Gaming graphics is superb- but looking for more adult gaming options  - hopefully in the future.I love the Amazon Prime ( music, movies, books, and free shipping- Perfect!!!).  However, I cancelled after 30 days.  I would like to see  a reduction in pricing or a bit more value provided.  I would Like to see Prime Music included in the Library selections of Fire TV - and a larger selection of NEWER music made available.  Movies and TV selections- see NEWER titles offered.The pristine quality of the HD streamed movies- hands down beats my current satellite HD selections!With today's competitive marketplace -  I would suspect many improvements and added value- are on the way.I do recommend this product- lots of choices and fun.
